text:
A neighboring lake has the same water plant growing. The Park Ranger made the following notes about the growth of the water plant on this lake. But she forgot to write down which month each number represents.

Which month does each expression represent?

Situation B. Studying Snakes around Ghost Lake

Garter snakes were introduced to the area around Ghost Lake 4 years ago. The park ranger claims the population is growing exponentially. She modeled the relationship between the number of snakes and the year with an exponential function as shown in the graph.

1. What is the snake population in years 2, 3 and 4?

2. Write an equation that represents the relationship in the graph. Explain what information the variables and numbers represent in the situation.

3. Monroe wrote that the population of the snakes is approximately 3.01 x 1010. What year did this happen?
